course.subject: CENG
course.name: Chemical Engineering Industrial Project
course.description: This course is intended to provide final-year chemical engineering students with practical hands-on training in the form of a full-time or part-time internship or co-op program in an engineering company. Credit load may be spread over a year. May be graded PP. For students in Chemical Engineering, Chemical and Environmental Engineering, and Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering with approval from the department.
course.prerequisites: BIEN 3910 OR CENG 3950
course.exclusions: CENG 4920, CENG 4930
